value: File:Acitrezza Faraglioni Moon Rise Sicilia Italy Italia - Creative Commons by gnuckx (4836343773).jpg

- Small islands formed from ancient Mt Etna lava flows providing a fascinating view. Mythology claimed that these were the giant stones thrown by the Cyclops as Jason and the Argonauts were escaping the island on their ships.

. From the shoreline, you can walk along the Lungomare and enjoying the sights and sounds with Ciclopia always in view. During the summer, it is possible to have a fisherman take you to the island for a small price. There you can lay a towel on the ground and soak up the Mediterranean sun!

value: content=Via Litteri, 57 - 95026. Three star hotel, located on the Sicilian coast, with a large terrace overlooking the natural marine park called "Isole Ciclopi"

content=Via Cardinale Dusmet, 4 - 95026. Three star hotel, with a friendly staff that understand English. The hotel is within walking distance from Acitrezza's center and "lungomare". The view from the hotel focuses on Isole Ciclopi. After a long day of sightseeing, it's always nice to come and relax by the refreshing pool and enjoy the Mediterranean views.
